item.title: How to Install Postman on Ubuntu 20.04
item.description: Installing Postman with Canonical’s Snap does not typically work well for me, so I prefer installing it natively. Here are the instructions for doing this on Ubuntu 20.04. Installation First, download the latest release: wget https://dl.pstmn.io/download/latest/linux64 -O postman.tar.gz Extract the underlying archive to /opt: sudo tar -xzvf postman.tar.gz -C /opt Create a symbolic link (shortcut) from the extracted Postman binary to /usr/bin/Postman so that it gets added to your $PATH and you can easily run it by typing the command postman:
